price: មានផ្លែឈើជាច្រើនសម្រាប់ពួកអ្នកនៅក្នុងនោះដែលពួក អ្នកអាចបរិភោគអំពីវាបាន។
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
